short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: High Definition Webcam Photo Booth Application For HD Webcams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take photos with your high definition webcam and apply filters and effects at real time.

New effects and filters will be added to this application over time as well as other new features, so stay posted!
